remarks: Lemma for ~ ntrivcvgmul .  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 19-Dec-2017.)
statement:
ntrivcvgmullem.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
ntrivcvgmullem.2 $e |- ( ph -> N e. Z ) $.
ntrivcvgmullem.3 $e |- ( ph -> P e. Z ) $.
ntrivcvgmullem.4 $e |- ( ph -> X =/= 0 ) $.
ntrivcvgmullem.5 $e |- ( ph -> Y =/= 0 ) $.
ntrivcvgmullem.6 $e |- ( ph -> seq N ( x. , F ) ~~> X ) $.
ntrivcvgmullem.7 $e |- ( ph -> seq P ( x. , G ) ~~> Y ) $.
ntrivcvgmullem.8 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) e. CC ) $.
ntrivcvgmullem.9 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( G ` k ) e. CC ) $.
ntrivcvgmullem.a $e |- ( ph -> N <_ P ) $.
ntrivcvgmullem.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( H ` k ) = ( ( F ` k ) x. ( G ` k ) ) ) $.
ntrivcvgmullem $p |- ( ph -> E. q e. Z E. w ( w =/= 0 /\ seq q ( x. , H ) ~~> w ) ) $.
$d F k $.
$d F w $.
$d G k $.
$d H k $.
$d H q w $.
$d N k $.
$d P k $.
$d P q w $.
$d Y w $.
$d Z k $.
$d Z q $.
$d k ph $.
